Articles.Content:
Build a lander boat which carry a rover and land it on the beach.

- The boat must sail at least 1 km in the water before landing the rover, which must traval 500m into the land.

- The rover can be either docked or not to the boat and the boat can be controlled by the rover's pod(& do not have a pod for itself).

- Amphibious vehicle is not an option, the boat have to be unable to move on the ground & the rover have to be unable to sail on water, they're going to need for each other.

- both the lander & the rover have to be made of stock parts

- no launch&land the rover. The boat must touch the beach & the rover must get off to the dry land by it's wheels only no lifts are permitted.

Also its recommended to use medium wheels for this challenge

Edited March 1, 2014 by JtPB

Scoring sytstem:

maybe something like this.

Max speed of boat: every M/s = 1 point

Max speed of rover: every m/s = 1 point

Have all science experiments = x points

Rover and boat can carry a kerbal every kerbal = 2 or 3 points

Maybe think up some more.

Add a scoreboard.

Be creative.

Good luck!
